name.en: Financial Statement Analysis and Business Valuation

goal.en: “This course is intended to help analyze organization’s economic activities through accounting’s point of view. The objective of the course is to familiarize you with the analysis skills of financial statements. From there, this course is designed to aid students with sufficient accounting background in comprehending the theoretical concepts and practical techniques in analysis of financial statements and business value.“
goal.ch: 本課程希望教導同學認識財務報表，進而培養從財務資訊使用者角度作分析、判斷的能力。幫助同學具備足夠會計知識，以瞭解理論觀念及實務技術，藉以解讀公司之財務報表並進行預測，應用財務理論對企業進行評價分析及企業決策，內容亦將涵蓋產業分析、評價工具及其實務應用。

content.en:
“Overview of Financial Statement Analysis
Analyzing Operating Activities
Analyzing Investing Activities
Analyzing Financing Activities
Financial Reporting ＆ Analysis
Cash Flow Analysis
Credit Analysis
Operating Budgets; Prospective Analysis
Equity Analysis and Valuation
Return on Invested Capital and Performance Profitability Analysis“
content.ch:
“財務報表分析基本觀念
營業活動分析;認識綜合損益表
投資活動與資產分析、權益證券投資與合併報表
籌資活動與負債、權益分析;認識資產負債表、權益變動表
現金流量分析;認識現金流量表
信用分析
預算、成長分析
企業評價
投資報酬分析、績效評估“

textbook.en: “K. R. Subramanyam, Financial Statement Analysis, 11th Edition“
textbook.ch: “K. R. Subramanyam, Financial Statement Analysis, 11th Edition“
